name: Golden Tulip Continental

reviews.text: I stayed in this hotel during a business trip to Rio.
reviews.title: An ok hotel...

reviews.text: The hotel is a block away from the Leme beach, which is ok. The room I stayed in was spacious and fine. The bathroom wasn't that good though, it didn't look too clean.
reviews.title: Excellent

likes.disliked: — Perhaps a bit out of the centre

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel service was good, people were very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Good value for Carnival

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The view from my room wasn't the best (because my room was on the building side). However, the view from the gym and pool was beautiful.
reviews.title: Very Dissapointing

reviews.text: There are many good restaurants at walk distance from the hotel. I thought the hotel to be a bit pricey for what it offers. But is is a good hotel if you get a good deal.
reviews.title: Would definitely recommend

reviews.text: This hotel has been newly renovated. The rooms are pretty spacious and very clean. Service was excellent. Breakfasts were very good, with a nice variety offered. They have small refrigerators, TVs, safes, and great showers with plenty of hot water. It is one block from the beach with small shops for buying bottled water across the street and great restaurants nearby. No real view. Nice pool and bar with grill. The prices were reasonable.
reviews.title: Great Service, Lovely Rooms

reviews.text: This Luxor is the older Luxor property, one block from the beach, but one block from several really good restaurants as well. The hotel was spiffy, newly renovated and clean. The restaurant was pretty good, the breakfasts (included) offered a nice variety of hot and cold items and fresh fruits and breads. The rooms were a good size. Daily maid service was excellent and polite. Safes and small refrigerators available in the rooms. Bottled water available in large sizes across the street for pennies. I would stay here again if I were to go back.
reviews.title: Copacabana - Good locale
Wouldn't recommend!
reviews.text: I stayed here in May. The location although near the Copocabana Beach, is not on the beach, but a block away, on a very noisy residential road. If you are unfortunate enough to get a view facing the road, the noise will keep you awake till gone midnight. It is also an airline crew hotline, so buses are arriving and departing in the early hours. The staff speak limited English. The area is a little rough, and can feel intimidating with the locals that gather on the road. I certainly wouldn't return.

reviews.title: Value for money
reviews.text: Comfortable hotel situated on the far (Leme) side of Copacabana. Approx. 50 metres from the beach. Reasonably sized rooms. Air-conditioned. Use of an in-room safe provided at a small fee, worthwhile option to have peace of mind. Mini fridge in room, with space to store your own items.

aka: Golden Tulip Continental Hotel Rio De Janeiro
